articles.author: Antony Sguazzin, Alberto Nardelli and Megan Durisin
articles.title: SA conspiracy communities 'targeted' by Putin propaganda against 'global famine' criticism - News24
articles.description: European governments have been alarmed by a Russian disinformation campaign that seeks to deflect criticism that President Vladimir Putin’s war with Ukraine risks leaving millions of people in Africa facing famine.
articles.content:
• Russian diplomats are pushing the narrative that sanctions, rather than Russian blockades, are causing shortages of grains and fertilizer in Africa.

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Alia Bhatt enjoys Tiramisu and a book during her time in Europe - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Alia Bhatt, who is currently in the UK for her Hollywood film Heart of Stone, has shared a picture of a dessert she enjoyed during the weekend. She is currently expecting her first child with Ranbir Kapoor.
articles.content: Alia Bhatt is expecting her first child with husband Ranbir Kapoor. The actor, who is in Europe at present, has now shared a glimpse of the dessert she enjoyed in the company of a book. The actor rel… [+1951 chars]

articles.author: Greg Mills
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE OP-ED: Ukraine crisis – the end of the beginning, or the end of the end? - Daily Maverick
articles.description: ‘Now this is not the end,’ observed Churchill following the Allied victory at El Alamein. ‘It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.’  Which category does Russia’s war in Ukraine fit into?
articles.content: Some see Vladimir Vladimirovich Putins move on Ukraine as signalling a return of history, the end of the beginning of a new Cold War, a redrawing of clear spheres of interest between East and West, b… [+5849 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Russia's defence minister reports capture of Ukraine city - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: KYIV: Russia's defence minister says Moscow's forces have taken control of the last major Ukrainian-held city in Ukraine's Luhansk province.
